Room.Name: Darmanian Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Darmanian Way, north of the great Lyanden Lake.
Room.LongDescription: The crystal waters of the Lyanden Lake come ashore to the south of the road, creating a small beach where children often go to play. The large lake is supplied by two rivers flowing in from the north and east. The high mountains in the east supply most of the water to Oceancrest.
